# --- Begin setup.bash autogenerated commands --- 
# Note: If you wish to update this file, restore the {FILENAME}.before_setup.bash.txt file first and edit it.
# Otherwise your changes *WILL* be lost on the next run of the setup.bash script!!!!!

# Patch for including priv-app permissions whitelist files from ( ${PWD}/local_permissions ).
ifneq (,$(wildcard $(LOCAL_PATH)/local_permissions/*.xml))
	PRODUCT_COPY_FILES += $(foreach file,$(wildcard $(LOCAL_PATH)/local_permissions/*.xml),$(file):system/etc/permissions/$(notdir $(file)) )
endif
